acceptance-test-run.title: Memoization should work correctly for collections and arrays
acceptance-test-run.name: memoizationShouldWorkCorrectlyForCollectionsAndArrays

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.MemoizationPojo
Then the Object should not be null
Then the given array should not be null or empty and contain elements of type tkYDInhlFU
Then the collection should have exactly RZy5Cp5Il3 elements
Then the collection should not be null or empty and each element should be of type AFtgNBLJ26
Then the two objects 5 and 5 should be equal
Then the Map should not be null or empty and each element should have key of type WvcmEqYg8e=sh14tYAADX and value of type fk8ZgCV4d7=Mo4D_yc2kF
Then the two objects 5 and 5 should be equal
